channel.title: Complier and maybe coding when i finnish
channel.description: CAN somebody tell me how to change the compiler it does not want to change and i want to know how please tell me because i need to replace thank you.Also at then end i have no knowledge of coding so can someone also help me on that.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 08:47:30 PM[/size][hr]anyone please help me[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 08:59:33 PM[/size][hr]@echo off COLOR 04 title YOURSERVERNAME compiler echo ------------------------- echo Files Being Compiled... echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls COLOR 02 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Files Compiled echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pause how do i put that code in my compiler thhing please helpe me.

item.title: Complier and maybe coding when i finnish
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

[quote=“Koolkid5, post:1, topic:51159”]CAN somebody tell me how to change the compiler it does not want to change and i want to know how please tell me because i need to replace thank you.Also at then end i have no knowledge of coding so can someone also help me on that.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 08:47:30 PM[/size][hr]anyone please help me[br][size=1]Posted on: January 23, 2007, 08:59:33 PM[/size][hr]@echo off
COLOR 04
title YOURSERVERNAME compiler
echo -------------------------
echo Files Being Compiled…
echo -------------------------
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Files Compiled
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause
how do i put that code in my compiler thhing please helpe me.[/quote]Go to google and search, Learning java. Then read until your eyes bleed and your brain explodes. Once that happens you should know enough java to create your own server.

Read full topic

item.title: Complier and maybe coding when i finnish
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Right click on the .bat then paste

@echo off
COLOR 04
title YOURSERVERNAME compiler
echo -------------------------
echo Files Being Compiled...
echo -------------------------
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
echo Files Compiled
echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Complier and maybe coding when i finnish
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

Complier content? Hmm let me see…
Try this @echo off COLOR 04 title YOURSERVERNAME compiler echo ------------------------- echo Files Being Compiled... echo ------------------------- "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls COLOR 02 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Files Compiled echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pause
just copy and paste hope this helps
